channel.title: CVE Feed for WPFunnels Team -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WPFunnels Team -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-37977|2024-08-02T17:23:27.881Z -- wpfunnels%20team -- drag%20%26%20drop%20sales%20funnel%20builder%20for%20wordpress%20%E2%80%93%20wpfunnels
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in WPFunnels Team Drag & Drop Sales Funnel Builder for WordPress – WPFunnels plugin <= 2.7.16 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-27965|2024-08-02T00:41:55.824Z -- wpfunnels%20team -- wpfunnels
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WPFunnels Team WPFunnels allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WPFunnels: from n/a through 3.0.6.
